definition: to deliberate/to talk over/to plan
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to comment on/to discuss/to suggest
to take one's time making a decision (idiom)/to consider at length

sentences.english: In the long run, the best is unquestionably the cheapest.
sentences.chinese: 从长计议，最好的无疑是最便宜的。

sentences.english: Let's disscuss about the mode of transportation.
sentences.chinese: 我们计议一下运输方式吧。

sentences.english: The head of the company's U.S. operations, however, says Huawei is willing to play the long game.
sentences.chinese: 但华为美国公司的负责人说，华为愿意从长计议。

sentences.english: Our problems are "structural, " and will take many years to solve.
sentences.chinese: 我们的问题是“结构性”的，需要从长计议。

sentences.english: I am always here to plan with you.
sentences.chinese: 我总是形影不离，与你计议前程。

sentences.english: As aresult they're more able to take a long-term view.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们更能够从长计议。

sentences.english: At his word the wind is still, and with his thought he appeaseth the deep, and the Lord hath planted islands therein.
sentences.chinese: 他一计议，深渊遂即沉没，其中的岛屿于是突出。

definition: to take one's time making a decision (idiom)/to consider at length
to negotiate/discussion/proposal
to reach an agreement/to agree upon
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to negotiate in secret/confidential discussions
to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to make a decision/to determine
to set out/to leave
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to think sth through/to consider carefully
this is no small thing (idiom)/to have a serious matter at hand
to go on a journey/to leave
to return/to go back/to come back
the matter should not be delayed/there's no time to lose
to plot/to scheme/to calculate
to make a decision/resolution/decisiveness/resolute
